languages.text: "Господин Тервантьяс сказал бы, если бы со мной что-то было не в порядке. Он говорит, что я ценный субъект... он ценит меня. И то, что я делаю".
"Master Tervantias would tell me if something was wrong with me. He says I'm a valuable specimen... He values me. And what I do."
languages.original_text: "Господин Тервантьяс сказал бы, если бы со мной что-то было не в порядке. Он говорит, что я ценный субъект... он ценит меня. И то, что я делаю".

traits.locale_text: "Master Tervantias would tell me if something was wrong with me. He says I'm a valuable specimen... he values me. And what I do."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Master Tervantias would tell me if something was wrong with me. He says I'm a valuable specimen... he values me. And what I do."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Master Tervantias would tell me if something was wrong with me. He says I'm a valuable specimen... He values me. And what I do."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「テルヴァンティアス様は私に何かあれば教えてくださる。私は価値のある標本だと言っていたもの…私を大切にしてくれている。私のすることもね」
languages.original_text: "Master Tervantias would tell me if something was wrong with me. He says I'm a valuable specimen... He values me. And what I do."

traits.locale_text: 「テルヴァンティアス様は私に何かあれば教えてくださる。私は価値のある標本だと言っていたもの…私を大切にしてくれている。私のすることもね」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “如果我出了什么问题，特万提亚斯大师一定会告诉我。他说我是个有价值的实验对象……他很重视我，也很重视我的服务。”
languages.original_text: "Master Tervantias would tell me if something was wrong with me. He says I'm a valuable specimen... He values me. And what I do."

traits.locale_text: “如果我出了什么问题，特万提亚斯大师一定会告诉我。他说我是个有价值的实验对象……他很重视我，也很重视我的服务。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «El amo Tervantias me avisaría si me pasara algo. Dice que soy un espécimen valioso... Me valora. A mí y a lo que hago».
languages.original_text: "Master Tervantias would tell me if something was wrong with me. He says I'm a valuable specimen... He values me. And what I do."

traits.locale_text: «El amo Tervantias me avisaría si me pasara algo. Dice que soy un espécimen valioso... Me valora. A mí y a lo que hago».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Meister Tervantias würde es mir sagen, wenn etwas mit mir nicht stimmt. Er sagt, ich bin ein wertvolles Versuchsstück ... Er weiß mich zu schätzen. Und meine Arbeit."
languages.original_text: "Master Tervantias would tell me if something was wrong with me. He says I'm a valuable specimen... He values me. And what I do."

traits.locale_text: "Meister Tervantias würde es mir sagen, wenn etwas mit mir nicht stimmt. Er sagt, ich bin ein wertvolles Versuchsstück ... Er weiß mich zu schätzen. Und meine Arbeit."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « S'il y avait le moindre souci, maître Tervantias me l'aurait dit. Il dit que je suis un spécimen précieux... J'ai beaucoup de valeur à ses yeux. Et mes talents aussi. »
languages.original_text: "Master Tervantias would tell me if something was wrong with me. He says I'm a valuable specimen... He values me. And what I do."

traits.locale_text: « S'il y avait le moindre souci, maître Tervantias me l'aurait dit. Il dit que je suis un spécimen précieux... J'ai beaucoup de valeur à ses yeux. Et mes talents aussi. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Sağlığımda bir sorun olsaydı Üstat Tervantias bana haber verirdi. Değerli bir numune olduğumu söylüyor... Bana ve yaptıklarıma değer veriyor."
languages.original_text: "Master Tervantias would tell me if something was wrong with me. He says I'm a valuable specimen... He values me. And what I do."

traits.locale_text: "Sağlığımda bir sorun olsaydı Üstat Tervantias bana haber verirdi. Değerli bir numune olduğumu söylüyor... Bana ve yaptıklarıma değer veriyor."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
